description.en: Hero Topic Teaser - hero image with teaser box
Issue cover template, hero and featured articles

value.fr: In these key areas, we link consumers to producers in order to create benefits for everybody involved in the value chain.

value.en: Taking an agribusiness approach to agricultural development can do much to provide income generating opportunities for rural communities, as well as helping to increase food security, reduce food imports and create jobs, especially for young people.
value.fr: Taking an agribusiness approach to agricultural development can do much to provide income generating opportunities for rural communities, as well as helping to increase food security, reduce food imports and create jobs, especially for young people.

value.en: The rapid technological changes taking place, especially in the areas of the Internet, mobile and data applications, create an enormous opportunity for growth in the agricultural sector.
value.fr: The rapid technological changes taking place, especially in the areas of the Internet, mobile and data applications, create an enormous opportunity for growth in the agricultural sector.

value.en: Building resilience for adaptation to climate change in the agriculture sector aims to increase the adaptive capacity of farmers and systems, both to recover from shocks and to be prepared for changes.
value.fr: Building resilience for adaptation to climate change in the agriculture sector aims to increase the adaptive capacity of farmers and systems, both to recover from shocks and to be prepared for changes.

description.en: Generic container to wrap content in layout instructions

value.en: Agribusinesses that can effectively link farmers to national, regional and international markets will contribute to poverty alleviation, export-led growth, food import substitution, enhanced food security and job creation.
value.fr: Agribusinesses that can effectively link farmers to national, regional and international markets will contribute to poverty alleviation, export-led growth, food import substitution, enhanced food security and job creation.

value.en: The additional investment in agriculture by private sector and public sector alike signals a renewed recognition that agriculture is a potent driver of economic growth and poverty reduction.
value.fr: The additional investment in agriculture by private sector and public sector alike signals a renewed recognition that agriculture is a potent driver of economic growth and poverty reduction.

value.en: Building on the work done to enhance regional trade and develop value chains, CTA is well placed to support the development of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).
value.fr: Building on the work done to enhance regional trade and develop value chains, CTA is well placed to support the development of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).

value.en: Smarter agri-food systems: more productive, more integrated, less wasteful and more profitable, inclusive and sustainable.
value.fr: Smarter agri-food systems: more productive, more integrated, less wasteful and more profitable, inclusive and sustainable.

description.en: Container with three channel columns, each containing a list of articles

value.en: CTA is a joint institution operating under the framework of the Cotonou Agreement between the ACP Group of States (Africa, the Caribbean and the Pacific) and the EU Member States (European Union). CTA is funded by the European Union.
value.fr: CTA fonctionne dans le cadre de l'Accord de Cotonou et est financé par l'UE.
